name: haptic
tagline: A self-hosted music server for streaming and organizing personal audio libraries
description: Haptic is a self-hosted music server for managing your audio library with a clean UI, playlists, and metadata views. It supports browser streaming and offline mode via PWA integration.

features.title: Library Management
features.description: Organize music collection, Metadata editing, Album artwork. Beautiful libraries

features.title: Offline Mode
features.description: Offline mode, Install as app, Background playback. Native-like experience

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Fast indexing, Filter by artist/album, Quick access. Find anything instantly

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Responsive design, Touch controls, Swipe gestures. Perfect for phones

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Your music, your server, Complete control. True ownership
